arts.ttl: Birmingham City player ratings as Stansfield and Iwata down Wrexham in front of Brady and Beckham - Alex Dicken
arts.sum: Blues held on for that and the seven minutes of additional time to end the night second in the League One table, still unbeaten and level on points with Wrexham having played a game less. Tom Brady and special guest David Beckham joined Blues chairman Tom Wagner in the directors’ box to oppose Wrexham owner and actor Rob McElhenney, and they were entertained by an electric performance in front of a sell-out crowd.

arts.ttl: Chris Davies makes Birmingham City point post-Wrexham and details A-Listers message to players
arts.sum: Blues excelled at St Andrew’s @ Knighthead Park in front of an A-List directors’ box to move up to second in League One, behind Wrexham only on goal difference having played a game less. Chris Davies hailed Birmingham City’s 3-1 win over Wrexham as their best performance of the season.

arts.ttl: Tom Brady's £15m gamble pays off as Birmingham City silence Wrexham and Rob McElhenney
arts.sum: Rob McElhenney and Ryan Reynolds' Wrexham were beaten 3-1 by Tom Brady's Birmingham City on Monday night, with Jay Stansfield showing his value after scoring a brace for the hosts

Tom Brady took the bragging rights over Rob McElhenney and Ryan Reynolds in the game dubbed the "Hollywood Derby" as Birmingham City ended Wrexham's unbeaten start to life in League One with a commanding 3-1 victory at St Andrew's on Monday evening.

arts.ttl: Tom Brady gets bragging rights over Wrexham’s Hollywood owners as Birmingham win
arts.sum: Blues minority owner Brady and Wrexham co-owner Rob McElhenney were joined in the stands by former England captain David Beckham.

arts.ttl: BREAKING: Paul Mullin appears to pull out of BITING Birmingham star during wild Wrexham clash
arts.sum: Wrexham were handed their first defeat of the League One season at the hands of Tom Brady's Birmingham City, with forward Paul Mullin seemingly nearly biting an opponent

arts.ttl: Manchester United legends David Beckham and Gary Neville spotted watching Wrexham play Birmingham
arts.sum: The two former Manchester United and England stars were at a star-studded League One clash pitting Wrexham, owned by Ryan Reynolds and Rob McElhenney, against NFL star Tom Brady's Birmingham

arts.ttl: Fantasy EFL Gameweek 6: Birmingham City vs Wrexham preview
arts.sum: The League One blockbuster clash as Birmingham City host Wrexham at St. Andrew's The post Fantasy EFL Gameweek 6: Birmingham City vs Wrexham preview appeared first on Best FPL Tips, Advice, Team News, Picks, and Statistics from Fantasy Football Scout.

arts.ttl: this is what we really think about Birmingham City
arts.sum: “I think the owners are hilarious, humble, and getting smarter about the game - I think they can get us to Premier League,” Janice Means of Chicago tells Birmingham Live . The celebrity derby, NFL versus Hollywood, a crisp League One Monday night clash - whatever you label Birmingham City’s fixture with Wrexham, it will have the eyes of the globe on England’s third tier.

arts.ttl: Why David Beckham and Gary Neville are watching Birmingham City against Wrexham
arts.sum: Neville has a huge affiliation for the EFL as he is a co-owner of League Two side Salford City. Romeo Beckham, son of David, is also present - as is former Manchester United defender and Sky Sports pundit Gary Neville.
